text: Limb-girdle Muscular Dystrophy  - Genetic Testing Registry: Collagen VI-related myopathy  - Genetic Testing Registry: Ullrich congenital muscular dystrophy  - Muscular Dystrophy UK: Could Cyclosporine A be used to treat Bethlem myopathy and Ullrich congenital muscular dystrophy?   These resources from MedlinePlus offer information about the diagnosis and management of various health conditions:  - Diagnostic Tests  - Drug Therapy  - Surgery and Rehabilitation  - Genetic Counseling   - Palliative
